entry.title: MKM836BS-D Black Metal Ladder Back Restaurant Barstool
entry.summary:
Vendor: MKLD Furniture
Type: Metal Barstools
Price: 120.00

FEATURES

These attractive black metal chairs are built to last! Offered at a very competitive price, these metal chairs also feature a 18 gauge fully welded steel frame and a streamlined, contemporary design to match your business. The wooden back and seat offers a modern style while provides durability.

Create a first-rate dining experience by offering your patrons tasty food, great service and attractive furnishings. These metal chair will offer a classic, elegant look to your establishment.

Width: 18''W

Height: 42''H

Depth: 20''D

Seat height: 32''H

entry.title: MKM890BS Black Window Back Metal Restaurant Barstool with Mahogany Wood Seat
entry.summary:
Vendor: MKLD Furniture
Type: Metal Barstools
Price: 129.00

FEATURES

The wood barstool will offer a classic,elegant look when furnishing your establishment. This stool is easy to clean,which is an important aspect when it comes to a business. This stool was designed to withstand the daily rigors in the hospitality industry,but will also provide a warm and inviting quality to your home.

The thick,foam padded seat will keep users comfortable. The durable Beechwood frame is stabilized using two support bars,which includes a footrest. The floor glides help protect your floors and ensure smooth gliding. This elegantly styled stool will highlight your home or business without disappointment.

 

Width: 18''W

Height: 42''H

Depth: 20''D

Seat height: 29''H
